title: Bonus Action
content:
Bonus Action in Baldur's Gate 3 are a type of special actions. Various Class Features, Spells, and other Abilities let you take an additional action on Your Turn called a Bonus Action. The Cunning Action feature, for example, allows a rogue to take a Bonus Action. You can take a Bonus Action only when a Special ability, spell, or other feature of the game states that you can do something as a Bonus Action. You otherwise donâ€™t have a Bonus Action to take.
